mapper.select: SELECT Fridge.id as id, Fridge.model as model, Brand.name as brand, Colour.colour as colour, CoolSyst.type as coolSyst, ConstrType.type as constrType FROM Fridge LEFT JOIN Brand ON Fridge.Brand_id = Brand.id LEFT JOIN Colour ON Fridge.Colour_id = Colour.id LEFT JOIN CoolSyst ON Fridge.CoolSyst_id = CoolSyst.id LEFT JOIN ConstrType ON Fridge.ConstrType_id = ConstrType.id WHERE Fridge.id = #{id} ;
